item.title: CVE-2024-6051|2024-09-30T12:33:25.438Z -- vercom%20s.a. -- redlink%20sdk
item.description: Cross Application Scripting vulnerability in Vercom S.A. Redlink SDKÂ in specific situations allows local code injection and to manipulate the view of a vulnerable application.This issue affects Redlink SDK versions through 1.13.
